{"id":635407755,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1644116805,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/635407755/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Smallest Value of the Rearranged Number","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long smallestNumber(long long num) {\n        string ans;\n        int f=0;\n        if(num<0){f=1;num=-1*num;}\n        while(num!=0){\n            ans+=to_string(num%10);\n            num=num/10;\n            // cout<<ans<<endl;;\n        }\n        sort(ans.begin(),ans.end());\n        if(f==1){\n            reverse(ans.begin(),ans.end());\n        }\n        if(ans[0]=='0'){\n            int i=0,j=0;\n            while(j<ans.size()){\n                if(ans[j]!='0'){\n                    swap(ans[j],ans[i]);\n                    break;\n                }\n                j++;\n            }\n        }\n        long long n=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<ans.size();i++){\n            n=n*10+ans[i]-'0';\n        }\n        return (f==1)?-1*n:n;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"smallest-value-of-the-rearranged-number"}
